documentation.content: Alert fires when a tablespace should be resized as it approaches high utilization, before an interruption in service occurs.

conditionPrometheusQueryLanguage.query:
(
  sum by (instance_id, tablespace_name) (
    {"workload.googleapis.com/oracle.tablespace.size", monitored_resource="gce_instance", state="used"})
  /
  (
    sum by (instance_id, tablespace_name) (
      {"workload.googleapis.com/oracle.tablespace.size", monitored_resource="gce_instance", state="used"})
    + 
    sum by (instance_id, tablespace_name) (
      {"workload.googleapis.com/oracle.tablespace.size", monitored_resource="gce_instance", state="free"})
  )
) > 0.85
